casebody.data:
H & R BLOCK BANK, a Federal Savings Bank, Plaintiff,
v.
Guy LAGOMARSINO, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Mrs. Guy Lagomarsino, Defendant. C-684 September Term 2017
080261 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000523-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
